## Load libraries

```{r package, message='hide',warning='hide',results='hold'}
suppressMessages(require(Seurat))
suppressMessages(require(Matrix))
suppressMessages(require(tidyverse))
suppressMessages(require(patchwork))
suppressMessages(require(ggplot2))
```

## Load data

```{r loaddata}
FFPE_BC_1.filt <- readRDS(file = "BC/FFPE/FFPE_snRNA_Patient_A.rds")
```

## UMAP plot

```{r umap}
Idents(FFPE_BC_1.filt) <- FFPE_BC_1.filt$manual_annot_0.8
DimPlot(FFPE_BC_1.filt, reduction = "umap", group.by = "manual_annot_0.8")
```

## Cluster markers

```{r markers}
sn.markers.1_30 <- read.csv(file = "BC/FFPE/top30_markers_FFPE_BC_A_0.8.csv")

sn.markers.1_30$cluster[sn.markers.1_30$cluster == "0"] <- "Cancer epithelial 1 (ER-positive cancer 1)"
sn.markers.1_30$cluster[sn.markers.1_30$cluster == "1"] <- "Cancer epithelial 2"
sn.markers.1_30$cluster[sn.markers.1_30$cluster == "2"] <- "Cancer epithelial 3"
sn.markers.1_30$cluster[sn.markers.1_30$cluster == "3"] <- "Cancer epithelial 4"
sn.markers.1_30$cluster[sn.markers.1_30$cluster == "4"] <- "TAM"
sn.markers.1_30$cluster[sn.markers.1_30$cluster == "5"] <- "Luminal epithelial cells"
sn.markers.1_30$cluster[sn.markers.1_30$cluster == "6"] <- "CAF"
sn.markers.1_30$cluster[sn.markers.1_30$cluster == "7"] <- "Cancer epithelial 5 (ER-positive cancer 2)"
sn.markers.1_30$cluster[sn.markers.1_30$cluster == "8"] <- "Pericytes"
sn.markers.1_30$cluster[sn.markers.1_30$cluster == "9"] <- "T cells"
sn.markers.1_30$cluster[sn.markers.1_30$cluster == "10"] <- "Endothelial cells"
sn.markers.1_30$cluster[sn.markers.1_30$cluster == "11"] <- "Smooth muscle cells"
sn.markers.1_30$cluster[sn.markers.1_30$cluster == "12"] <- "Basal epithelial cells"
sn.markers.1_30$cluster[sn.markers.1_30$cluster == "13"] <- "Cancer epithelial 6 (Cancer undergoing EMT)"
sn.markers.1_30$cluster[sn.markers.1_30$cluster == "14"] <- "B cells"

bc_1_top5 <- sn.markers.1_30 %>%
  group_by(cluster) %>%
  arrange(cluster) %>%
  top_n(wt = avg_log2FC, n = 5)

DotPlot(FFPE_BC_1.filt, 
        features = unique(bc_1_top5$gene), 
        col.min = 0, 
        dot.min = 0, 
        dot.scale = 5,
        group.by = "manual_annot_0.8") +
  RotatedAxis() + 
  xlab('Marker genes') + 
  ylab('Samples') + 
  scale_y_discrete(limits=rev) + 
  scale_x_discrete(position = "top") + 
  theme(text = element_text(size = 10), 
        axis.text.x=element_text(size=14),
        axis.text.x.top = element_text(margin = margin(b = 1), hjust = 0),
        axis.text.y=element_text(size=12), 
        legend.direction="horizontal", 
        legend.position = "top",
        plot.margin = margin(t = 20, r = 20, b = 20, l = 20, unit = "pt"))
```
